title: Hi, I was charging my Pixel 3 XL (with wire) and now it won't turn on.
content: I was charging my pixel 3 xl (with wire) and when I went see to turn the device on it won't turn on. I tried to hold the power button and I also tried to hold the power button with the volume button, but so far no luck. Very disappointing because i just purchased the phone last year. I also have 2 year of warranty.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
